questions.questionEn: Which year was the first SSC CGL exam conducted?
questions.questionHi: पहली SSC CGL परीक्षा किस वर्ष आयोजित की गई थी?
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: The first SSC CGL exam was conducted in 1975.

questions.questionEn: What is the full form of SSC?
questions.questionHi: SSC का पूरा नाम क्या है?
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: SSC stands for Staff Selection Commission.
